entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Rain showers early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
